blog.name: deadly-dingus
blog.title: THE LAST MELON
blog.description:
19|she/her|Canada
Hey, I'm D! Welcome to my corner of the web. I love video games, art and spooky stuff, though my interests are always changing. Currently obsessed with the Predator series and anything Yautja related. Some of my favorite game series at the moment include Pokemon, Fallout, Dark Souls, Kirby and Warframe. Expect loads of pointless memes reblogged from my favorite blogs. I also do art sometimes! It's all tagged under #dingusdoodles

tags: sorry if this took a while! i’ve been busy in my life outside rhe internet!
summary: What do you think about Pokemon Plus and Minus? It's a rumor from 2014 and the rumor mentions the Nintendo Switch before it was...
question: What do you think about Pokemon Plus and Minus? It's a rumor from 2014 and the rumor mentions the Nintendo Switch before it was revealed (not by the Switch name, but it speaks of a new Pokemon game on a handheld-home console hybrid). Also, Pokemon has featured Plusle and Minun in two Twitter posts. James Turner's New Year's art on Twitter featured 2018 in Sun and Moon's color scheme and 2019 in green and pink (maybe green for plus? pink for minus?).
answer:
I have indeed heard about the rumored “Pokemon Plus and Minus”! But I had totally forgotten about it, since the last I heard about it was before I made this blog, and a lot of what I had seen as “proofs of the rumor being true” from other users were a bit unconvincing. I wasn’t aware it had been circulating for so long thought! I’m getting intrigued by this now, i’ll talk a bit about what I think of this!


•First of all, afaik, during the Switch development, it was known as the NX for the longest time. And the concept of the joycons wasn’t an immediate thought. I remember seeing concept arts for the NX going around online showing an oval-like screen with no joycons at all. Thought this is just a concept art, if the concept of Plus and Minus was rumored as far as 2014, then to me it would be a huge coincidence that it would have ended sounding like the Switch’s joycons.


•And again basing myself on the year you gave me for the rumor, I don’t know if they would have really planned the game before gen 7? Maybe it was in their plans, but I think they’d focus more on creating the current generation beforehand. And maybe the name Plus and Minus are the concept names for the switch game? I forgot the proper name for those, but theyre names used internally to refer to the game in production. For example, I think Let’s Go was referred as Beluga internally, and that the GSC remakes were named Rainbow temporarly. This is just like they do with consoles, like NX for the Switch or Dolphin for the Gamecube!


•The information you have brought up does make sense! I’ve seen the things with the plusle and minun, but I always took it as a way to just hint at a switch release since the joycons have the same colors as plusle and minun. We’ll wait and see what future tells us! I’m more open minded about pokemon plus and minus now that i’ve been thinking about it for a bit


These are just my thoughts on this! I’m no professional, and I don’t work in the industry nor do I plan to. I’m just a lad who enjoys analyzing things basing myself on what i’m seein’ :-)

summary: As I go through all my censored posts this morning, I realize that Tumblr really doesn’t like Fullmetal Alchemist, Yui...
body: As I go through all my censored posts this morning, I realize that Tumblr really doesn’t like Fullmetal Alchemist, Yui Yuigahama, Umaru-chan, Team RWBY, Studio Ghibli, Pokemon trainers, my face, kittens, flowers, babies, and marriage. Just a word to the wise for anyone posting content out there.

summary: "The arrival of POPPLIO and its evolutionary line can be traced far back into kroels history, as records show their introduction...
caption:
“The arrival of POPPLIO and its evolutionary line can be traced far back into kroels history, as records show their introduction to popular shows held in the great theaters and aquariums of ancient civilizations, used for mere entertaintment rather than battle, countless murals, tile mosaics and frescos found in ancient fountains and public plazas stll show the playful figures of this pokemon dancing and singing for the peoples enjoyment. However, when this pokemon was introduced to the wild as many tried to make its population grow in native waters rather than traveling to far islands to capture them, proved to be not as easily. Kroel tropical oceans, being populated by large predators as GLOTONINA and JORMUGRAND was no place for the merry seal pokemon, who, in order to survive, traveled and made its home in the northern, colder waters of Kroel. In a more harsh enviroment, populated by strong pokemon on its own, the once happy-going species underwant a very extreme change to adapt to such harsh conditions, by growing a thic coat of fur and a more aggressive nature, becoming powerful predators on their own. Kroelian PRIMARINA is a completely different beast from is Alolan counterpart, they are ruthless and cold when it comes to hunting and even when it comes to humans, one must aproach with caution for its sharp fangs an claws can still cause lots of damage. One thing hasnt changed however, PRIMARINA’s voice is still one of its most notable qualities, however, what once was a beautiful singing voice, now is a terrible scream that can incapacitate others with its sheer volume, and it is even said its voice can make the air colder. When using the power of a Z crystal, PRIMARINA can use the move "Blood-Curdling Wail”, a powerful  cry that can shatter the artic ice into pieces and its said can knock a person to unconciussnes within seconds.“

???-POPPLIO
-Ice
-The Sea Lion pokemon
-Ability: Winter Coat* - Chilling Voice**(HA)

–>Evolves at lv. 17<–

???-BRIONNE
-Ice/Dark
-The Punk Star Pokemon
-Ability:  Winter Coat - Chilling Voice(HA)

–>Evolves at lv. 34<–

???-PRIMARINA
-Ice/Dark
-The Vocalist Pokemon
-Ability: Winter Coat - Chilling Voice(HA)
-Sig. Move: Scream Queen "The use attacks its opponent with an ear-piercing shriek, any pokemon who is asleep or frozen will suffer double damage and its condition will be cured.”
   Type: Dark
   PP: 10 (max 16)
   Power: 90
   Accuracy: 100%

–>With Kroelprimarium Z<–

Allows Kroelian Primarina to upgrade Scream Queen to the special Z-Move Blood-Curdling Wail

*Defense rises during Hail storm
** Sound based moves become Ice-type

Kroelian Popplio is based on the pup of the Pagophilus groenlandicus or Harp Seal

Kroelian Brionne and Primarina are based on the Hydrurga leptonyx or Leopard Seal

While Primarina draws inpsirarion from Mermaids, Kroelian Primarina is inspired by the Rusalka

REQUESTS are always CLOSED unless stated otherwise. personal/ooc tag is #careless whispers.

tags: i stole this idea from occasional-squadra-di-narcotici btw
summary: anyways i’ve been messing around and fiddled for a while with pokemon team planner, so i guess here are the teams i came up with...
body:
anyways i’ve been messing around and fiddled for a while with pokemon team planner, so i guess here are the teams i came up with for mr. salt and mr. sugar

Sale

not a very impressive team, but still manages to help him in one way or another. beheeyem is, i think, the closest to Kraftwerk it gets, so it’s an obvious choice. hitmonchan is probably his strongest pokemon and the one he actually uses in battles. girafarig is most likely stolen, although it doesn’t seem to mind it’s new owner at all. both krabby and snubbull are gifts from Zucchero. he hates the former (or pretends to do so), but, ironically, warmed up a lot to the latter and often brags about setting it up for beauty contests (much to Zucchero’s delight).

Zucchero

Zucchero is… well. at first glance it’s not so bad i guess. the dude doesn’t really care that much for having strong pokemon on his team and just catches whatever he likes, and he likes spikes. beedrill is his main one he uses to stab people who get in his way and exeggutor is a gift from Sale, who spent two weeks trying to catch it and forces him to bring it along so “he has at least one useful pokemon in his stupid team”. at the other hand, he also gave him cacnea, so the spikeyness among his cool awesome pokemon is still pretty balanced.

spoink is.. well. a cruel joke of mine.

reblog.comment:
anyways i’ve been messing around and fiddled for a while with pokemon team planner, so i guess here are the teams i came up with for mr. salt and mr. sugar

Sale

not a very impressive team, but still manages to help him in one way or another. beheeyem is, i think, the closest to Kraftwerk it gets, so it’s an obvious choice. hitmonchan is probably his strongest pokemon and the one he actually uses in battles. girafarig is most likely stolen, although it doesn’t seem to mind it’s new owner at all. both krabby and snubbull are gifts from Zucchero. he hates the former (or pretends to do so), but, ironically, warmed up a lot to the latter and often brags about setting it up for beauty contests (much to Zucchero’s delight).

Zucchero

Zucchero is… well. at first glance it’s not so bad i guess. the dude doesn’t really care that much for having strong pokemon on his team and just catches whatever he likes, and he likes spikes. beedrill is his main one he uses to stab people who get in his way and exeggutor is a gift from Sale, who spent two weeks trying to catch it and forces him to bring it along so “he has at least one useful pokemon in his stupid team”. at the other hand, he also gave him cacnea, so the spikeyness among his cool awesome pokemon is still pretty balanced.

spoink is.. well. a cruel joke of mine.

blog.name: darksilvania
blog.title: Darksilvania's Art
blog.description:
Step into the Dark.
This is my art blog, It is mostly OC's and Pokemon art, but there are monsters lurking around. Mostly SFW but sometimes something a little bit NSFW may show around, so, be careful.

summary: ???-CAOUTCHION [Caoutchouc-Cushion] -Normal -The Air Bag Pokemon -Ability: Rubber* - Prankster(HA) -Dex: "Its soft body can...
caption:
???-CAOUTCHION [Caoutchouc-Cushion]
-Normal
-The Air Bag Pokemon
-Ability: Rubber* - Prankster(HA)
-Dex: “Its soft body can inflate to great size by taking-in air, making it look more intimidating, but it is not able to hold the air in for too long and the smallest touch will make it release it, with a very distinctive sound. It is known for being playful and amicable, prefering to make others laugh rather than fight.”
-Moveset:
    -Bounce
    -Belly Drum
    -Play Nice
    -Poison Gas

–>Evolves with Max Happiness while holding a Lucky Egg<–

???-CAOUTCHICK [Caoutchouc-Chicken]
-Normal
-The Air Horn Pokemon
-Ability: Rubber - Prankster(HA)
-Dex: “Its long neck and wide troath, all together with its flexible body capable of filling up with lots of air, allow it to make incredibly loud and powerful sounds that can startle even the fiercest of enemies. Despite its powerful and threathening roar, it is actually a very friendly pokemon that likes to play pranks on others for fun.”
-Moveset:
    -Hyper Voice
    -Noble Roar
    -Soft-Boiled
    -Lovely Kiss

*Physical attacks do half the damage, pokemon is inmune to electric-type attacks

blog.name: princess-of-the-day
blog.title: A Princess Every Day!
blog.description: Just another daily character blog... featuring your favorite princesses!

summary: Today’s Princess of the Day is: Princess Sara, from Pokemon. The princess of the Mirage Kingdom, Princess Sara is sworn to...
caption:
Today’s Princess of the Day is: Princess Sara, from Pokemon.

The princess of the Mirage Kingdom, Princess Sara is sworn to protect the Togepi Paradise alongside the rest of the royal family. She is a kindhearted girl who takes her duties very seriously.

title: Chinchou - 170
body:
Its antennae, which evolved from a fin, have both positive and negative charges flowing through them.

- Pokemon Crystal
